abstract: NHL Roundup; Washington Capitals defeat New York Islanders, 3-2.
lead_paragraph: Ovechkin, who had been barred for one game for skipping the All-Star Game, helped Washington avoid a third straight loss with a 3-2 victory.

headline.main: Alex Ovechkin, Back From Suspension, Scores Winner as Capitals Beat Islanders
headline.print_headline: Ovechkin Scores Game-Winner Against Islanders in His Return

snippet: Ovechkin, who had been barred for one game for skipping the All-Star Game, helped Washington avoid a third straight loss with a 3-2 victory.
